name: Thunderstrike (itch) (CodeTalker)
description:
Thunderstrike

Are you ready Private!? In this 2.5D side-scrolling shoot-em-up, fight your way through 15 waves of enemy combatants. This might be a tough mission for a new recruit like you, but I see a lot of potential. Watch out for the variety of enemies and the fearsome final boss, after all it's the main reason why you're on this mission. Before you begin, I'll give you one last word of advice. If you take out the colorful enemies, you can increase the health of your chopper and the power of your gun.  Some enemies may even drop some extra armor...and if you're really lucky rumor has it that you may even be able to become invincible.

Controls

Movement - W/A/S/D or Arrow Keys

Pause - Esc

Helicopter will shoot automatically
